english: find a needle in a haystack
fell into the dao of ghosts
in the midst of the storm

chinese: 抱着一线不死的希望来追

english: a dog's eye not appreciating gold inlaid with jade
refined like orchids and jade trees
not know the immensity of heaven and earth
as different as heaven and earth
commit the taboo of spilling blood
bet everything on one throw of the dice
as though face-to-face with their nemesis

chinese: 先自损一万，又自损八千
english: to lose a little after losing a lot
